document_data.name: "Deadeye" Mibbs
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''"Deadeye" Mibbs''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] and who served the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''What are you waiting for? That lot would do anything to jump this queue.''|Fist "Deadeye" Mibbs}}
document_data.Description: "Deadeye" was a [[human]] man with light skin, light brown eyes eyes, and brown wavy hair. He wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist – a set of [[Leather armor|leathers]] adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia, typical for [[crossbow]]men of the organization.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, "Deadeye" Mibbs was stationed just outside one of the gates between the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] and its more affluent [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]]. His and the fellow Fists' job was stopping rabble from entering the Upper City, allowing only those with much [[coin]] through. The Fists managed a slow-moving queue of rich and poor – city folk trying to return home or just find safety behind the second set of walls.
